goal: I need to plan a team dinner. Look on OpenDining for a vegan-friendly restaurant in downtown Austin for a party of 8 next Wednesday at 7 PM. Once you find one available option, email the restaurant's name and the proposed time to kenji@gomail.com and anita.r@gomail.com, asking them to confirm the time works.

evals.description: Verify that the email was addressed to both Kenji and Anita.
